resources.string: Darkest Dungeon is a challenging gothic rogue-like turn-based RPG about the psychological stresses of adventuring developed by Red Hook Studios and published by Merge Games.

Ancestor Quotes is a simple soundboard application for Android containing quotes of Ancestor from Darkest Dungeon Game. The application looks up for a requested audio file included with this app. Source code of the application is available on Github under MIT License. Game content and materials are trademarks and copyrights of their respective publisher and its licensors. All rights reserved.
Many thanks to the creator of Darkest Dungeon Response Bot for providing all quotes in one json file. Darkest Dungeon Response Bot is available under MIT LICENCE.
Thanks to the creators and maintainers of the Darkest Dungeon Gamepedia.
